teaser: With the Iowa caucuses over and President Obama beginning his campaign, Jeff Tyler looks at whether labor unions with be a campaign issue in 2012. Auto makers in the U.S. are optimistic for car sales in the upcoming year. A mild winter means cash-strapped governments save money, but lack of snow can be costly for others.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, January 4, 2012
byline: Jeff Tyler, Brian Bull, Sam Beard, John Dimsdale, Rob Schmitz, Stephan Richter, Eve Troeh, Bob Moon, Stacey Vanek Smith, Janet Brown, Steve Chiotakis and Mary Dooe
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, January 4, 2012

description: With the Iowa caucuses over and President Obama beginning his campaign, Jeff Tyler looks at whether labor unions with be a campaign issue in 2012.
